### BIO

I am a PhD student at the University of Tsukuba. I graduated in Computer Science (2016) in the University of Brasilia, Brazil, and I my Master Degree at the University of Tsukuba (2020). My research focus on Multi Objective Evolutionary Computation, neuro-evolution and Artificial Life.
